description: This file defines the IamPolicy class, which manages AWS IAM policies, including creation, reading, deletion, and waiting for policy creation. It interacts with AWS via boto3 and is part of an infrastructure management system.

classes.name: IamPolicy
classes.description: Represents an AWS IAM Policy resource, providing methods to create, read, delete, and wait for the policy to be available.

methods.name: _create
methods.description: Creates the IAM policy in AWS using provided attributes.

methods.name: post_create
methods.description: Waits for the IAM policy to be fully created and available.

methods.name: _read
methods.description: Reads and loads the IAM policy details from AWS.

methods.name: _delete
methods.description: Deletes the IAM policy from AWS, detaching it from all entities and removing versions.
